title: Hour 2 - John Smoltz Oct 19, 2020
itunes:title: Hour 2 - John Smoltz Oct 19, 2020
description:
John Smoltz joins Dan Patrick to discuss the World Series match-up between the Tampa Rays and the Los Angeles Dodgers. Dan asks John what's going on with Dodgers ace pitcher Clayton Kershaw. Smoltz also shares a story about when he was told he was tipping his pitches.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
